00000002 ; patadr, pattern address hex 0100
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000001
00000004 ; 2450 MHz 
00000004
00000080
00000008
00000008
00000092
00000002 ; BIAS ON 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000001
00000004 ; CALPWR 0v for full power, DAC A & B 
0000001C
00000000 ; 4 LSB's
00000040 ; 8 MSB's, 1/4 scale
00000017 ; Write both DAC's
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 100 ticks out(10us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000064
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse with meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000014 ; width, 100ns ticks, 2us
00000000 
00000000
00000001 ; meas flag
00000002 ; meas offset=200ns, 2 ticks
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 200 ticks out(20us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
000000C8
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse with meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000014 ; width, 100ns ticks, 2us
00000000 
00000000
00000001 ; meas flag
00000002 ; meas offset=2 ticks
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 260 ticks out(26us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000004
00000001
00000000
00000000
00000002 ; BIAS OFF 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
